about_the_game:
Welcome to Thief Escape - an exciting stealth action game. Your task is to escape from a ship full of bloodthirsty pirates. To leave this dangerous place, you need to collect all the coins scattered around the ship and find the key to the exit. The game combines tension and dynamics.

As a nimble thief, you must move stealthily along the deck, squeezing between barrels and avoiding the attention of enemies. Do not fall into the clutches of those pirates!

Bombs will help you in your fight against the pirates. Once you pick up a bomb, you become invulnerable. During these moments, try to kill as many enemies as possible so they do not interfere with you collecting your gold.

Game Features:

Exciting stealth gameplay
Intense action
Diverse levels
Use of bombs for temporary invulnerability and enemy destruction
High tension and dynamics
